introduction: WatchTranslations is a tool that notifies you when a message in your favorite projects in translatewiki.net is not translated into the language of your choice.
permission-denied-more: You are not authorised to continue, make sure you entered the correct URL.
permission-denied-login: You are not authorised to continue, perhaps you should try to log in?
duplicate-edit: Could not edit: would create a duplicate watched component
preferences-frequency-hours: How frequently should the tool email you?
preferences-pref-language: Which should be your default watch language?
preferences-pref-locale: Which language should the tool interface use?
none-currently-watched: Click the button below to start watching new translations.
confirm-delete-component: Are you sure you want to delete this component?
success-create: You created a new watched component.
